travelplanapp.travelplanapp

Class CheckForm

  • java.lang.Object
    • travelplanapp.travelplanapp.CheckForm

  • @Path(value="/checkform")
public class CheckForm
extends java.lang.Object
    CheckForm is a class in charge of checking if the user input is valid when trying to create a new plan or a new album. The checking result is returned to front end by JSON data.
    Since:
    1.0
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Yanhong Ju

    • Method Detail

      • checkPlan

        @GET
@Path(value="/plan/{planName}")
public java.lang.String checkPlan(@PathParam(value="planName")
                                  java.lang.String planName)
        Consumes a HttpRequest with planName. Check if this plan name already exists by checking if a corresponding entity exists. Generate JSON String for the result and return JSON to the user.
        Parameters:
        planName - the name of the plan to be created
        Returns:
        JSON String containing if planName exists
        Since:
        1.0

      • checkAlbum

        @GET
@Path(value="/album/{albumName}")
public java.lang.String checkAlbum(@PathParam(value="albumName")
                                   java.lang.String albumName)
        Consumes a HttpRequest with albumName. Check if this album name already exists by checking if a corresponding entity exists. Generate JSON String for the result and return JSON to the user.
        Parameters:
        albumName - the name of the album to be created
        Returns:
        JSON String containing if albumName exists
        Since:
        1.0
